Container.Name: chromium

Branch.TagDescription: Latest releases using the selkies base
Latest releases using the kasmvnc base

Container.Overview: Chromium(https://www.chromium.org/chromium-projects/) is an open-source browser project that aims to build a safer, faster, and more stable way for all users to experience the web.
Container.Changes:
### 2025-07-01 - Add Kasm branch.
### 2025-06-24 - Rebase to Selkies.
### 2025-04-03 - Update chromium launch options to improve performance.
### 2024-02-10 - Update Readme with new env vars and ingest proper PWA icon.
### 2024-01-08 - Fix re-launch issue for chromium by purging temp files on launch.
### 2023-12-29 - Rebase to Debian Bookworm.
### 2023-05-13 - Rebase to Alpine 3.18.
### 2023-04-01 - Preserve arguments passed to Chromium and restructure to use wrapper.
### 2023-03-18 - Initial release.

Config.Name: WebUI
Config.Description: HTTP Chromium desktop gui, must be proxied.

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: Users home directory in the container, stores local files and settings

Config.Name: CHROME_CLI
Config.Description: Specify one or multiple Chromium CLI flags, this string will be passed to the application in full.
